articles.description: A section of fans in the Southampton end were heard airing the anthem midway through the first half, before Liverpool's away end responded with a chant of 'f**k the Tories'.
articles.content: Southampton fans have taunted visiting Liverpool supporters by singing the National Anthem during their Premier League clash at St Mary's - just 24 hours after 'God Save the Queen' was at the centre … [+4692 chars]

articles.author: Kieran Jackson
articles.title: Amir Khan claims 'curries' and the 'appalling diet' is to blame for Asians not making it in boxing - Daily Mail
articles.description: Khan had a successful professional career but has sparked outrage by saying that Asians having 'curries' as their diet is why there aren't more champions from an Asian background.
articles.content:
Retired former world champion Amir Khan has caused controversy by saying an 'appalling diet' is to blame for Asian fighters not making it in the upper echelons of boxing. 
The Bolton hero announced … [+2109 chars]
